graph {
	rankdir=LR
	A [pos="0,0!"]
	B [pos="1,0.1!"]
	C [pos="0,-1!"]
	D [pos="1.2,-1.1!"]
	E [pos="2,0.1!"]
	F [pos="2.3,-0.9!"]
	G [pos="3.2,-0.2!"]
	A -- B [label=2]
	A -- C [label=5]
	B -- C [label=4]
	B -- D [label=6]
	B -- E [label=10]
	C -- D [label=2]
	D -- F [label=1]
	E -- F [label=3]
	E -- G [label=5]
	F -- G [label=9]
}

graph {
	rankdir=LR
	A [pos="0,0!"]
	B [pos="1,0.1!"]
	C [pos="0,-1!"]
	D [pos="1.2,-1.1!"]
	E [pos="2,0.1!"]
	F [pos="2.3,-0.9!"]
	G [pos="3.2,-0.2!"]
	A -- B [label=2]
	A -- C [label=5 color=red style=bold]
	B -- C [label=4]
	B -- D [label=6]
	B -- E [label=10]
	C -- D [label=2 color=red style=bold]
	D -- F [label=1 color=red style=bold]
	E -- F [label=3 color=red style=bold]
	E -- G [label=5 color=red style=bold]
	F -- G [label=9]
}
